law.text: The association shall be subject to examination and regulation by the commissioner. The board of directors shall submit, not later than March 30 of each year, a financial report for the preceding calendar year in a form approved by the commissioner.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 1470, effective July 15, 2010. -- Created 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 137, sec. 14, effective June 16, 1972.
